verses.verse: Children, <S%G5043><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> in the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> is right. <S%G1342><s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother; <S%G3384><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> with promise; <S%G1860><s%>
That it may be well <S%G2095><s%> with you, and you may live <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3118><s%> long <S%G3118><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And, you fathers, <S%G3962><s%> provoke <S%G3949><s%> not your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> to wrath: <S%G3949><s%> but bring <S%G1625><s%> them up in the nurture <S%G3809><s%> and admonition <S%G3559><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Servants, <S%G1401><s%> be obedient <S%G5219><s%> to them that are your masters <S%G2962><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and trembling, <S%G5156><s%> in singleness <S%G572><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> as to Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Not with eye-service, <S%G3787><s%> as men pleasers; <S%G441><s%> but as the servants <S%G1401><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from the heart; <S%G5590><s%>
With good <S%G2133><s%> will <S%G2133><s%> doing <S%G1398><s%> service, <S%G1398><s%> as to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and not to men: <S%G444><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that whatever <S%G3739><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing any <S%G1538><s%> man does, <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall he receive <S%G2865><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> he be bond <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free. <S%G1658><s%>

And, you masters, <S%G2962><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things to them, forbearing <S%G447><s%> threatening: <S%G547><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is there respect <S%G4382><s%> of persons <S%G4382><s%> with him.
Finally, <S%G3063><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and in the power <S%G2904><s%> of his might. <S%G2479><s%>

Put <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the wiles <S%G3180><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

For we wrestle <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3823><s%> not against <S%G4314><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> but against <S%G4314><s%> principalities, <S%G746><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> powers, <S%G1849><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the rulers <S%G2888><s%> of the darkness <S%G4655><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> wickedness <S%G4189><s%> in high <S%G2032><s%> places.

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> take <S%G353><s%> to you the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> in the evil <S%G4190><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and having done <S%G2716><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> to stand. <S%G2476><s%>

Stand <S%G2476><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having your <S%G5216><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> girt <S%G4024><s%> about <S%G4024><s%> with truth, <S%G226><s%> and having <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> the breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>
And your <S%G3588><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> shod <S%G5265><s%> with the preparation <S%G2091><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of peace; <S%G1515><s%>

Above <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> taking <S%G353><s%> the shield <S%G2375><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> with which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to quench <S%G4570><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fiery <S%G4448><s%> darts <S%G956><s%> of the wicked. <S%G4190><s%>

And take <S%G1209><s%> the helmet <S%G4030><s%> of salvation, <S%G4992><s%> and the sword <S%G3162><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is the word <S%G4487><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

Praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G1722><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> and supplication <S%G1162><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and watching <S%G69><s%> thereunto <S%G1519><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance <S%G4343><s%> and supplication <S%G1162><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> saints; <S%G40><s%>

And for me, that utterance <S%G3056><s%> may be given <S%G1325><s%> to me, that I may open <S%G1722><s%> <S%G457><s%> my mouth <S%G4750><s%> boldly, <S%G3954><s%> to make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%>

For which <S%G3739><s%> I am an ambassador <S%G4243><s%> in bonds: <S%G254><s%> that therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> I may speak boldly, <S%G3955><s%> as I ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But that you also <S%G2532><s%> may know <S%G1492><s%> my affairs, <S%G2596><s%> and how <S%G5101><s%> I do, <S%G4238><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> shall make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you all <S%G3956><s%> things:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> to you for the same <S%G846><s%> purpose, that you might know <S%G1097><s%> our affairs, <S%G4012><s%> and that he might comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to the brothers, <S%G80><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> with faith, <S%G4102><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with all <S%G3956><s%> them that love <S%G25><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in sincerity. <S%G861><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To the Ephesians written from Rome, by Tychicus.
